name: From the Well in the Valley
name_original: From the Well in the Valley
description:
Leave your well and explore the world.

Collect 5 stars or just wander around.

Controls
  • AD to Move
  • Space to Jump (quick tap for a small jump)
  • Hold S to Look Down
  • R to Reset
Music

Laurie Spiegel - East River Dawn

Made in one week based on the prompt "An overscoped game" for Prototype Studio at the NYUGC.
